string.text: Zdarov's boss. Tell me about yourself.

I came to the Zone in 2008. Then there was not so much lyudno.Postepenno I earned credibility among the brothers and then, a couple of years ago, I made a real clan of gangsters with their own concepts and foundations. Since then we keep the Dump and all the approaches to it, cheat the suckers and moo the debtors who and the rod with Agroproma.Nedavno here with the neutrals we had a zavarushka.Major them - Valerian decided, together with his gang to the brotherhood with the sword go. Well, and as a result of olives Nemereno in the barrel caught, but the bitch survived... They say in the bar now mistakes tsya padla.No nothing, and soon we will take the bar and its inhabitants in the shit perch XLI-hy.Veselaya zhituha we have in common.
Hogs, and what kind of jug is behind me?

You're talking about Silver, it's my bodyguard, so to speak. Well, dick li. Yoga is now quite gone, so I need some kind of protection. This, as you put it, junk mercenary, came here at my request. sign here he gave me and one of his 'lads.' A good, executive and most importantly laconic uncle of this Silver. In general, what I need. Do not advise it to provoke...
